entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Dryden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dryden Airport 05:22 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.4°C
Wind: NE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 late this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High plus 1.
